title: Citizen Ruth_(1996)[XviD]
description:
Title: Citizen Ruth

Released: 1996
Length: 01:45:20
Size: 1.02GB
Genre: Comedy, Drama

Plot: A cross-addicted woman with a compulsion for glue-sniffing,
drugs, alcohol and cigarettes becomes the center for political debate when 
she accidentally becomes pregnant and seeks an abortion. Ruth Stoops
(Laura Dern) becomes front page news when the Baby Savers take Ruth
under their protection (and roof) and attempt to clean up her act.
The other side immediately conspires to take Ruth away from the 
right-to-lifers in a high tense abduction scheme to publicize her 
right to an abortion. However, Ruth has plans of her own that do not 
include either side of the issue.

Starring: Laura Dern, Kurtwood Smith, Swoosie Kurtz, Mary Kay Place, Kelly
Preston, M.C. Gainey, Kenneth Mars and others.
